üìä $BNB  Overtakes CME in Bitcoin Futures  Binance has officially surpassed CME Group in Bitcoin futures open interest, even as institutions cut back exposure. Retail and offshore traders are clearly staying active.  üè¶ CME‚Äôs slowdown reflects institutional caution, not a full exit. Funds are reducing leverage while waiting for clearer macro and regulatory signals. Meanwhile, trading momentum continues to flow elsewhere.  üî• This growing split between institutions and traders often precedes major price moves. Who do you think sets the next $BTC   trend? üöÄ $BNB  is attempting to stabilize after a sharp impulse higher.  $BNB  is now consolidating above a rising support trendline, showing controlled pullbacks rather than impulsive selling.  üìâ Technical View: ‚Ä¢ Pattern: ascending channel following an impulsive breakout ‚Ä¢ Bias: bullish while price holds above rising trendline support ‚Ä¢ Key Level: ascending support line and the recent swing high resistance zone  ‚úÖFull analytics in telegram->  bit.ly/cryptolingrid    ‚ö†Ô∏è This bullish scenario could be invalidated if price breaks below the rising support trendline, opening room for a deeper corrective move.  #BNB  #BNBChain  #BNB Price Analysis#

BNB remains below its long-term descending trendline, and price action is still showing weak upside follow-through. Each bounce is getting rejected near dynamic resistance, which keeps the overall structure bearish.

A trendline reclaim would be needed to shift bias back to the upside. Until that happens, the market remains tilted toward a move into lower support zones.

‚Ä¢ Key areas: trendline support and recent swing-high resistance

If price breaks below the rising support, this setup would weaken and a deeper correction becomes more likely.

#BNb

$BNB is still trading below its longer-term descending trendline, and recent price action shows limited upside follow-through.


Rallies continue to stall near dynamic resistance, suggesting the market hasn‚Äôt yet shifted from distribution into a constructive recovery phase. Until that structure changes, price behavior remains more reactive than directional.


A clean reclaim of the trendline would likely be the signal that momentum is rotating back to the upside. Without that confirmation, consolidation or pressure toward lower support zones remains part of the risk landscape.


For now, structure matters more than short-term bounces.

$BNB is still trading below its long-term descending trendline üìâ, with weak upside follow-through ‚ö°. Every bounce is rejected at dynamic resistance üöß, keeping the market structure bearish.


A strong break above the trendline üîù is needed to shift the bias upward. Until then, lower support zones remain in focus üìå.

$BNB  has finally broken out of its bearish trendline after being stuck under it since November.  It's a soft breakout, but still, it's an early sign of a possible reversal.

$BNB continues to trade below its long-term descending trendline, with price action showing limited upside momentum. Each recovery attempt is being capped by dynamic resistance, maintaining a bearish market structure.


A confirmed reclaim of the trendline would be required to shift the bias back to the upside. Until then, downside risk remains elevated, with lower support levels still in focus.

$BNB is holding above the $850 zone after a sharp rejection from ~$870.

The dip toward ~$846 found strong buyers, and price quickly reclaimed $860  a positive sign.
As long as $850‚Äì855 acts as support, bulls may attempt another push toward the $870‚Äì875 resistance.

A clean break above that level could open room for continuation, while losing $850 would put pressure back on the range.

Momentum is rebuilding  patience here matters.

In 2017, a Web3 company started from a tiny office

It faced immense challenges, and fierce competition

By 2025, the company has grown to 300M users & holds $158B in assets

Binance is now the world‚Äôs leading blockchain ecosystem

Here‚Äôs the recap story of @binance 2025 üëá

#2025withBinance 
> Jan: passed 250M users
> Feb: Pascal hard fork on BNB Chain
> April: Lorentz hard fork: Block times reduced from 3s ‚Üí 1.5s
> May: Bhutan launched crypto tourism payments with Binance Pay & integrated with Brazil‚Äôs PIX
> June: Maxwell hard fork: Block times reduced further to ~0.75s & AI-powered app
> July: Binance 8th anniversary & $2.88M in rewards Through Crypto Meteor Shower
> Oct: BNB hit a new ATH & @yzilabs launched a $1B fund
> Nov: partnered with @zachxbt to strengthen scam tracing & BlackRock‚Äôs BUIDL Fund live on @BNBCHAIN
> Dec: ADGM approvals, Yi He as co-CEO, crossed 300M users, Achieves ISO/IEC 42001 
& I was honoured as one of Binance‚Äôs Top 10 Global Voices

And if we look at the bigger picture in 2025:
> Spot volume: ~$7T (‚âà5√ó closest competitor)
> Spot trades: 24.1B (new ATH)
> Perpetual futures volume: $24.6T (2√ó nearest rival)
> Capital inflows: $1.17T (+31% YoY)
> @GiggleAcademy reached 90K+ kids in 156 countries

Huge progress! Big W for the @binance ecosystem
